scripts.lint: cd .. && node node_modules/webpack/bin/tslint --project tsconfig.json && tslint --project ui.tsconfig.json
scripts.pretty: cd .. && prettier --config .prettierrc --loglevel warn --write "./**/*.{ts,md,json}" && tslint --project tsconfig.json --fix && tslint --project ui.tsconfig.json --fix
scripts.rebuild: npm run reset && npm run build
scripts.reset: cd .. && npm run clean && npm install --no-save
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run reset && npm run bundle && npm run compress
